title: [Neuroscience] Researchers show that the protein involved in Parkinson’s disease, α-synuclein, can propagate to various cerebral regions through the lymphatic system and then aggregates. Targeting these early events (α-synuclein monomer and brain lymphatic system) may limit the progression of Parkinson
[Medicine] Synthesis of cannabidiol-based compounds as ACE2 inhibitors with potential application in the treatment of COVID-19
